name: Miratope
description: A renderer for polytopes. Still in alpha.

scripts._bbt: echo Running Browserify + Babelify + Tinyify... & browserify src-js\main.js -o out-js\main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p tinyify & echo Done!
scripts._b: echo Running Browserify... & browserify src-js\main.js -o out-js\main.js & echo Done!
scripts.jsdoc: echo Running JSDoc... & jsdoc -c jsdoc.json & echo Done!
scripts.eslint: echo Running ESLint... & "node_modules\.bin\eslint" src-ts\**\*.ts{,x} --fix & echo Done!
scripts.tsc: echo Running TypeScript... & tsc & echo Done!

author: Miratope authors
